long_description: Keep your ski or board edges sharp, clean and burr-free with the Swix Universal Diamond Stone. Diamond stones offer the cutting ability of a file and the deburring and polishing ability of a stone, all in 1 tool. Diamond cluster pattern effectively maintains a smooth, sharp edge while also bringing out a touch of a high-polish shine. Fits easily in a pocket for quick removal of burrs while carving turns at the resort.
short_description: Keep your ski or board edges sharp, clean and burr-free with the Swix Universal Diamond Stone.
